For people of certain demographics like growing children, breastfeeding mothers, those going through menopause, as well as older men/women proper calcium intake is very essential.

cart.description: EverHerb Ashwagandha is a health supplement and an ayurvedic formula that contains Ashwagandha extract from roots of the Ashwagandha plant. One of the most revered herbs in Ayurveda, Ashwagandha helps the body resist physiological and psychological stress by enabling it to reserve and sustain vital energy all through the day and promoting a sound sleep during the night.
